# Academic Writing Management System

## Project Overview
A full-stack Academic Writing Management System built with:
- **Backend**: NestJS with TypeORM and PostgreSQL
- **Frontend**: React with Vite
- **Authentication**: JWT with role-based access
- **Database**: PostgreSQL

## Architecture
- Clean architecture with proper separation of concerns
- Modular design with NestJS modules
- Role-based authentication (Admin/Writer)
- Automated shift management system
- Real-time analytics and reporting

## Key Features
- User management with invite-only registration
- Order lifecycle management
- 24-hour shift system with automatic creation
- Payment tracking and balance management
- Comprehensive analytics dashboard
- File upload and submission system

## Development Guidelines
- Follow TypeScript best practices
- Implement proper error handling
- Use DTOs for validation
- Write clean, commented code
- Follow REST API conventions
